mapper.select: SELECT SI.STORE_ID, SI.USER_ID, UI.USER_NAME, UI.LEVEL_ID, UI.USER_LEVEL_NAME, UI.USER_CONTACT, SI.STORE_CATEGORY_CODE, SI.STORE_CATEGORY_NAME, SI.STORE_NAME, SI.STORE_CONTACT, SI.STORE_ADDRESS, SI.OPENING_TIME, SI.STORE_REG_DATE, RG.REGION_CODE, RG.REGION_NAME, DT.DISTRICT_CODE, DT.DISTRICT_NAME, CT.CONTENTS_ID, CT.CONTENTS_CAT_CODE, CT.CONTENTS_CAT_NAME, CT.CONTENTS_NAME, CT.CONTENT_ADDRESS, CT.CONTENTS_DURATION, CT.CONTENTS_PG, CT.CONTENTS_PRICE, CT.CONTENTS_REG_DATE FROM STORE_INFO AS SI INNER JOIN USER_INFO AS UI ON SI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID INNER JOIN DISTRICT AS DT ON SI.DISTRICT_CODE = DT.DISTRICT_CODE INNER JOIN REGION AS RG ON DT.REGION_CODE = RG.REGION_CODE INNER JOIN CONTENTS AS CT ON SI.STORE_ID = CT.STORE_ID GROUP BY SI.STORE_ID;

SELECT SI.STORE_CATEGORY_CODE AS storeCategoryCode, SI.STORE_CATEGORY_NAME AS storeCategoryName, COUNT(SI.STORE_ID) AS storeCount FROM STORE_INFO AS SI INNER JOIN STORE_CATEGORY AS SC ON SI.STORE_CATEGORY_CODE = SC.STORE_CATEGORY_CODE GROUP BY SC.STORE_CATEGORY_CODE;

SELECT SI.STORE_ID AS storeId, SI.USER_ID AS userId, UI.USER_NAME AS userName, SI.STORE_CATEGORY_CODE AS storeCategoryCode, SI.DISTRICT_CODE AS districtCode, SI.STORE_CATEGORY_NAME AS storeCategoryName, SI.BUSINESS_NUMBER AS businessNumber, SI.CORPORATION_NUMBER AS corporationNumber, SI.STORE_NAME AS storeName, SI.STORE_CONTACT AS storeContact, UI.USER_EMAIL AS userEmail, SI.STORE_ADDRESS AS storeAddress, SI.OPENING_TIME AS openingTime, SI.STORE_REG_DATE AS storeRegDate FROM STORE_INFO AS SI INNER JOIN USER_INFO AS UI ON SI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID;

SELECT SI.STORE_ID AS storeId, SI.USER_ID AS userId, UI.USER_NAME AS userName, SI.STORE_CATEGORY_CODE AS storeCategoryCode, SI.DISTRICT_CODE AS districtCode, SI.STORE_CATEGORY_NAME AS storeCategoryName, SI.BUSINESS_NUMBER AS businessNumber, SI.CORPORATION_NUMBER AS corporationNumber, SI.STORE_NAME AS storeName, SI.STORE_CONTACT AS storeContact, UI.USER_EMAIL AS userEmail, SI.STORE_ADDRESS AS storeAddress, SI.OPENING_TIME AS openingTime, SI.STORE_REG_DATE AS storeRegDate FROM STORE_INFO AS SI INNER JOIN USER_INFO AS UI ON SI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE ${searchKey} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%');

SELECT SI.STORE_ID AS storeId, SI.USER_ID AS userId, UI.USER_STAT AS userStat, UI.USER_NAME AS userName, SI.STORE_CATEGORY_CODE AS storeCategoryCode, SI.DISTRICT_CODE AS districtCode, SI.STORE_CATEGORY_NAME AS storeCategoryName, SI.BUSINESS_NUMBER AS businessNumber, SI.CORPORATION_NUMBER AS corporationNumber, SI.STORE_NAME AS storeName, SI.STORE_CONTACT AS storeContact, UI.USER_EMAIL AS userEmail, SI.STORE_ADDRESS AS storeAddress, SI.OPENING_TIME AS openingTime, SI.STORE_REG_DATE AS storeRegDate FROM STORE_INFO AS SI INNER JOIN USER_INFO AS UI ON SI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE SI.STORE_ID = #{storeId};
